item.title: Hello World
item.author: palucki
item.description: Hello World! Or maybe rather: std::cout << "Hello World\n" Welcome to my personal blog! Why I decided to start a blog? Creating my own space on the web have always been my dream. I always wanted to share my projects, knowledge, tips&tricks or unusual experiences with others. Also, I wanted to have my kind-of portfolio online, which serves the purpose of my CV. Is there a better way to do this than starting a blog?
